meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Anuj Patel Alison Carey Tim Aten Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7417.

td.p: Anuj Patel, a scientist from San Francisco, California
Alison Carey, a housewife from Cleveland Heights, Ohio
Tim Aten, an editor from Vermilion, Ohio (whose 2-day cash winnings total $47,800)

tr.td: SPORTS ROUND NUMBERS
THAT'S JUST NUTS!
A BARRAGE OF BOOKS
MINING FOR "ORE"
STRUCTURED
CLUES ACROSS AMERICA
(Alex: Featuring our on-air talent from our affiliate stations.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Hall of Famer Lefty Grove won 300 games at this baseball position & then no more')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: Hall of Famer Lefty Grove won 300 games at this baseball position & then no more

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', 'Mount Olympus was said to have many trees bearing this nut; no word if the gods had them "roasting on an open fire"')
